LibraryApp - Class in library.app
Main entry point for the Library Management System application.
LibraryApp() - Constructor for class library.app.LibraryApp
 
Loan - Class in library.domain
Represents a loan record for a borrowed book in the library system.
Loan(User, Book, LocalDate, LocalDate) - Constructor for class library.domain.Loan
Constructs a new Loan for a specific book and user.
LoanCD - Class in library.domain
Represents a loan record for a borrowed CD in the library system.
LoanCD(User, CD, LocalDate, LocalDate) - Constructor for class library.domain.LoanCD
Constructs a CD loan record.
LoanRepository - Class in library.repository
Repository responsible for storing and managing all loan records in the library system.
LoanRepository() - Constructor for class library.repository.LoanRepository
 
LoanService - Class in library.service
Service responsible for handling all borrowing operations in the library system.
LoanService(LoanRepository) - Constructor for class library.service.LoanService
Constructs a LoanService using the system clock.
LoanService(LoanRepository, Clock) - Constructor for class library.service.LoanService
Constructs a LoanService with a custom clock (used for testing overdue logic).
